title: JewelMill: Sky island
description:
Description
In this game you will need to use your brain power to solve the puzzles,
but we can promise you that it will be fun and addictive.
The whole thing is about matching jewels but not in the old boring way.
In JewelMill you will be able to drag the jewels only by the routes of the puzzles.
You will have to match different kinds of jewels diagonally and vertically by these routes.
The aim of the JewelMill game is to match all the jewels by putting three of them in a line.
You can only finish the puzzles by matching all the same coloured and shaped jewels.
To put it more simply it is almost like playing the nine men's morris game without an opponent. 
For an innovative experience we used differently shaped maps for a more colourful fun. 
So, another difference between the mill game and our game is that
here you have several kinds of jewels, not just black and white marbles.
While we developed this application our aim was to achieve a fresh and cool game play with simply stunning and meditative 
visual. We hope that you will have fun in our flying mill of jewels and you will be able to spend your time well worth with our game.
Thank you for the download. 
Jewel up!
